title: Star Guardian Lux and Poro fight off Dark Star Kayle using Sheen
body: IF you know what game this is from, we're best friends now.

replies.body: I've never actually played Crystal Shards, is it on virtual console or do I have to find a cartridge?
I have the cartridge but I think it's on virtual console too!
cmon kayle is cuter then zero
Kirby is Rubick doe, after all he steals your abilities.
is that kirby and asuka fighting an angel from neon genesis?
